issue.title: [C++][Docs] Add documentation for authoring compute kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12724](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12724). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To help incoming developer's to work in the compute layer, it would be good to have documentation on the process to follow for authoring a new compute kernel. This document can help demystify the inner workings of the functions and data structures in the compute layer.
